tutorial.speak:
Now that we have our volunteer team and parent group set up, let's create a classroom. Click Add First Classroom.
Enter a name for your classroom, such as Elementary Class.
Click the Volunteer Team dropdown. You'll see the Elementary Teachers team we created earlier. Select it to give your teachers access to upcoming lessons in the B1 app.
Click the Parent Student Group dropdown. You'll see the Parents Of Elementary Kids group we created. Select it to share lessons with parents via the B1 app.
Click Save to create your classroom.
Your classroom has been created and is now ready to use. You can add more classrooms by clicking the Add button.
